name: 15 Minutes Dungeon
description:
The gameplay is simple. Can you beat the dungeon in 15 minutes?

15 Minutes Dungeon is a game that combines roguelike elements with real-time action.

Tips:

  • Defeat enemies to level up.
  • Pick up skill boxes to become stronger.
  • Keep defeating enemies to level up further.
  • Enemies become stronger as time passes, so you should hurry.
  • Remaining on the same floor will spawn even more enemies.



    If you have any ideas on how to make this game even better, please let us know. Here's the link to our Discord.
    https://discord.gg/wuUcWmYx62
